directions: Process first 5 ingredients in blender until smooth. Pour into small bowl. Mix in herbs. Season dressing to taste with salt and pepper.
Toss spinach and pecans in large bowl with enough dressing to coat. Divide among 4 plates. Top with sliced pears and sprinkle with cheese.
*Available at Japanese markets and natural foods stores, and in the Asian foods section of some supermarkets.
ingredients: 4 cups (packed) fresh baby spinach leaves (from one 6-ounce bag)
2 ripe pears, unpeeled, cored, thinly sliced
title: Spinach and Pear Salad with Rosemary Vinaigrette
